about_the_game:
The Level Limit Breach 1 is a 3x item set where all party members' max level is increased by 100.

The Level Limit Breach 1 includes:

・Limit Breaker Potion 1
・Limit Breaker Potion 2
・Limit Breaker Potion 3
detailed_description:
The Level Limit Breach 1 is a 3x item set where all party members' max level is increased by 100.

The Level Limit Breach 1 includes:

・Limit Breaker Potion 1
・Limit Breaker Potion 2
・Limit Breaker Potion 3

name: Dragon Star Varnir Level Limit Breach 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit (DirectX 11 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit (DirectX 11 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card

short_description: Increase all party members' max level by 100 with the Level Limit Breach 1!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
